<title level="1" right="Focus 1" pfs="Standard">[Incendiary Aura](/Spells.aspx?ID=755)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Cursebound" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=320" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Fire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=72" />
<trait label="Oracle" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=319" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 232 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Mystery**
[Flames](/Mysteries.aspx?ID=5)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Area** 10-foot emanation

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You surround yourself with a combustible aura. Each time a creature within the emanation takes fire damage, it catches on fire, taking 2d4 [persistent fire damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29).

---
**Heightened (+2)** Increase the persistent damage by 1d4 and the radius of the emanation by 5 feet.
name: Incendiary Aura
